Package org.texgen.signals

Set of built-in signal classes that can be used as signal sources.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AnimalStripe AnimalStripe is a channel signal that returns the strength of an animal stripe for a given point on the texture.
ConstantSignal Returns a constant value as a signal.
LightSignal Emulates the signal of a light based on distance from a point, and strength of signal
MandelbrotSignal Signal that returns values calculated from the Mandelbrot set of Fractals
MarbleSignal Signal to use for creating marble-type textures using the noisy sine functions.
MarbleSignal.Builder  
NoiseSignal Returns a fractal noise signal based on the u,v input values.
RadialSignal RadialSignal radiates the signal from 0 to 1 from the center of the texture to the value defined by radius.
RoundedCornerSignal Channel Signal for producing a square with a rounded corner
SineWave Returns a sine wave derived value based on the input value.
TextureSignal Returns a signal based on the returned value from a texture The returned signal can consist of any of the components (red, green, blue or alpha)
USignal Channel signal that returns the u value
VSignal Channel signal that returns the v value
 

Package org.texgen.signals Description

Set of built-in signal classes that can be used as signal sources.
